images.caption: Figure 1:Overview of the proposed activation-informed merging (AIM) in LLMs.

Figure 2:The Pareto fronts of models under different scenarios. Note that the points in these plots represent all models benchmarked in Table1, however, to make the plots more readable, we only visualize the dominating points in each case. The measured increases in HV Gain when AIM is applied can be clearly seen in the Pareto frontier shifting further forward when AIM is applied compared to when only a population of merged models is evaluated.
